name: Dash Ball
description:
WARNING! This game was one of our previous projects, made in 2016 by Uubu , Paws Menu and Louck, for the LowRezJam. No updates or support are expected for this game.

Dash ball is a local multiplayer game. Your goal is to get and keep the ball as long as possible, in a small arena. 

Game made for LowRezJam 2016, by Uubu, Paws Menu and Louck (me).

We will be very happy if you can leave a comment about our project. Your feedback is very important, and we need it for the realization of the next version of our game :).

But more importantly, have fun!

HOW TO PLAY!

The game can be played with a keyboard or/and controllers.

Actions

If you are a player:
A - Dash! To move quickly and to push (and stun) your opponents. Pressed a second time - at the right moment - you can make a second Dash! But the recovery will be hard.
B - Block! To counter Dash or to catch hard ball.

If you are the carrier - the one with the ball:
A - Throw! To throw the ball in your direction at high speed. You can stun your opponent in that way.
B - Curved pass! To pass the ball to your friend, in a easy way.

There are many ways to catch the ball. The most common one is to Dash on the carrier. Or you can follow and hang on to the player, to slow him and to steal his ball... if he doesn't escape!


If you want to use the keyboard, there are two possible configuration (two players can play this game with the same keyboard):

Configuration one
Movement - W A S D (or Z Q S D)
A button - Space
B button - Left Shift

Configuration two
Movement - Arrow keys
A button - Right Shift or Enter
B button - Left Ctrl or Alt Gr

Have fun :).
